metadata.title: CVE-2024-28757 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libexpat through 2.6.1 allows an XML Entity Expansion attack when there isisolated use of external parsers (created viaXML_ExternalEntityParserCreate).

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'changes too intrusive').
xmlrpc-c package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
vnc4 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.

coin3 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
matanza package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
tdom package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
vtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
smart package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
libxmltok: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'changes too intrusive').
